column4: Moose just a hint... typing in all caps is a good way to annoy people, please don't.
Okay thanks, mjbrooks.  Coming from my Mac & Windows backgrounds, there is a command to open a file "as if you double-clicked it" in each OS's shell ('open' in mac; 'start' in MS).
use exec or the path to the file to do that
sometimes you need execution privileges so do chmod +x program
